name: 1 Cake Left
description:
There is only one cake left, so you need to get it before your opponent does! 

Capture the cake, and hold it on your head until your coloured bar is full, and you win! Easy right? Only problem is that the player you play againts (IRL) will try to do the same. (And if you jump out of the play area, the other player win.)

Controls:

Player 1 (Green): W = Jump - A and D = Left and Right

Player 2 (Orange): Up Arrow = Jump  - Left Arrow and Right Arrow = Left and Right

Made using Unity, for GMTK GAME JAM 2019.
